title.narrative: Humanitarian Assistance and Resilience Programme Facility (HARP)

description.narrative: This activity (Humanitarian Assistance and Resilience Programme Facility (HARP)) is a component of Burma Humanitarian Assistance and Resilience Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Humanitarian assistance' and a budget of £88,974,800. This component benefits Myanmar, and works in the following sector(s): Material relief assistance and services , Emergency food assistance, Relief co-ordination and support services, Immediate post-emergency reconstruction and rehabilitation. , with the following implementing partners: Crown Agents Bank, Crown Agents Limited. The start date is 29-08-2016 and the end date is 30-06-2022.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
